task.summary:
There was a problem in the template wizard-all.html which LiftScreen uses.
It just didn't find the hook in the template to bind the rendered fields…
Massive commit related to getting Squeryl to work with Lift Record. Setting up jndi connection to h2 db.
added submenus to add and list authors
changed author list to table format.
